author: cvs2svn
msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'TURBINE_2_3'.

author: henning
msg: Some small improvements on the doctype code from Scott.
- methods don't need to be static, this is an application tool, so
- provide default values for the various doctype keys; if you don't
want to have a doctype, either don't use the $page.DocType statement
on the template or explicitly null out the parameters.
- call private method "buildDocType" to avoid confusion with public

author: henning
msg: Improve debugging and reporting by having a protected log object which
contains the right (derived) category for all page and screen classes.
